import string


[docs]class MyTemplate(string.Template):
    delimiter = 'Â¤'



[docs]def substitute(template_file, subst_dic):
    template = open(template_file, 'r')
    template = MyTemplate(template.read())

    return template.safe_substitute(subst_dic)
